basics.name: Willy Chung
basics.label: Engineernig Graduate
basics.summary: A French-born Engineering graduate interested in natural language processing and AI for good, currently residing in Hong Kong.

work.name: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
work.summary: Teaching assistant for two courses. Gave tutorials to groups of 80 BSc students and assisted lab sessions during the semester. Designed and graded two programming assignments on word embeddings and transformer models for text classification, and overviewed course projects for 10 groups of graduate students (MPhil/PhD)
highlights: ELEC1200 - A System View of Communications
ELEC6910Y - Topics in Deep Natural Language Processing

volunteer: Elected Secretary General of the Astronomy Student Association
